questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A decorated tree with lights 
C) A building
D) A body of water

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A person
B) A tree with lights
C) A bench
D) A fountain

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Buildings
B) Other trees and lights
C) A mountain
D) A river

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A picnic table
B) A car
C) A statue
D) A lake

Which colors are predominantly seen in the tree decorations?
A) Red and yellow
B) Blue and green
C) Purple and orange
D) Multiple colors including blue, red, and green

What can be seen to the left of the tree?
A) A river
B) Another tree lit up in purple
C) A building
D) A playground

What kind of lights are used to decorate the tree?
A) Lanterns
B) String lights
C) Neon lights
D) Candles

How are the branches of the tree decorated?
A) With flowers
B) With colorful lights
C) With paper lanterns
D) With ribbons

What is the main source of light in the photo?
A) Streetlights
B) The moon
C) The lights on the tree
D) Car headlights

How are the lights arranged on the tree?
A) Randomly scattered
B) In a specific pattern
C) On the branches and randomly scattered
D) Only on the trunk

What is the shape of the lights used on the tree?
A) Circular
B) Triangular and linear
C) Square
D) Star-shaped

What can be seen at the base of the tree?
A) Flowers
B) A picnic table
C) A stone path
D) Water

What is the overall composition of the photo?
A) Symmetrical
B) Asymmetrical
C) Minimalistic
D) Cluttered

What is the most striking feature of the tree?
A) Its height
B) Its decorations with lights 
C) Its leaves
D) Its bark

How does the photo use light and shadow?
A) To create a natural look
B) To highlight the tree's features
C) To obscure the tree
D) To create a dramatic effect

What kind of lights are hanging from the branches?
A) Fairy lights
B) Neon lights
C) Lanterns
D) Christmas lights

How does the tree stand out in the photo?
A) By its size
B) By its decorations and lights
C) By its location
D) By its shape

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A building
B) A tree with lights
C) A group of people
D) A body of water
